title: Planning a trip to the Northern Lights? Try the first EVER combination mindfulness retreat
text:
Planning a trip to the Northern Lights? Try the first EVER combination mindfulness retreat Planning a trip to the Northern Lights? Try the first EVER combination mindfulness retreat IF YOU thought the Northern Lights were beautiful, why not try practising mindfulness and yoga as the sky dazzles above you? PUBLISHED: 16:55, Wed, Oct 14, 2015 | UPDATED: 17:06, Wed, Oct 14, 2015 GETTY The Northern Lights are a popular tourist attraction in Finland and Iceland 
The first ever Northern Lights retreat has been launched and guests will be able to combine inspiration from the Northern Lights with expert guidance in yoga, meditation and wellbeing. 
All in the name of achieving an elevated state of mindfulness, Northern Lights for the Soul is based in a remote Arctic lodge in Kilpisjärvi, Finland. Related articles How to get RID of spiders: Entomologist Dr Christopher reveals the... 
Jonny Cooper, Director of Off the Map Travel and Northern Lights Travel expert said: "Anyone who has experienced the Arctic night sky and the Northern Lights will confirm that you instantly feel in awe of our place in Space. 
"Combine this with the isolation and beauty of the Arctic tundra, experts in meditation, yoga and mindfulness and you have a perfect platform from which to dedicate time to physical and emotional wellbeing.” PR A new retreat has opened combining the Northern Lights with oyga PR This type of view isn't uncommon to those who live in Finland, but attracts huge tourism 
The trip includes special access to a hot tub and ice hole, a nutritionally designed diet focussing on the health benefits of local recipes and produce and a delve into local around the Aurora. 
Hop onboard the mindfulness train from the 7th - 11th March 2016. Alongside Northern Lights guides and experts, the retreat will be led by renowned Mindful Journey’s coaches and leading yoga instructors from the UK. 
Jonny added: "If you arrive negative and burnt out, we want you to leave with a new outlook, a fresh perspective, feeling energised and touched by life in the Arctic and the Northern Lights. 
"This aims to be more than a quick fix, but a tool to help you make fundamental changes to your physical and emotional outlook and wellbeing – all inspired by the Northern Lights." PR The retreat combines the Northern Lights with mindfulness and yoga 
A four night, full board exclusive Northern Lights retreat with Off the Map Travel costs from just £1399 per person. 
This includes a private room sharing a Saana chalet, return airport transfers, daily yoga and meditation sessions, access to the spa, hot-tub and ice hole, optional 1:1 meditation sessions with experts, daily Northern Lights hunts and a traditional kota evening with a meal cooked over an open fire. This price excludes flights and additional activities. 
For more information about Northern Lights for the Soul and other Aurora holiday opportunities visitwww.offthemaptravel.co.uk, call +44 (0) 800 566 8901 or email info@offthemaptravel.co.uk Related articles
